text: Mehrab Fatemi (Persian: محراب فاطمی) (born 1975) is an Iranian strongman and powerlifter. ==Strongman career== Mehrab participated five times in Iran's Strongest Man competition, and hold the record of most wins with 4 wins (1998, 2001, 2005–2006). ==See also== *Iran's Strongest Man *World Powerlifting Congress *World Strongman Cup Federation ==References== ==External links== * گفتگو با مهراب فاطمی * افشاگری محراب فاطمی و برادرش علیه مردان آهنین و فرامرز خودنگاه * گفت و گو با برادران فاطمی * گفت و گو با فاطمی ها Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Iranian strength athletes Category:Iranian powerlifters
title: Mehrab Fatemi
